amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc consisting of amendments printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 numbered 73, 146, 149, 150, 152, 153, 156, 157, 158, 161, 163, 166, 170, 171, and 172.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A033) offered by Mr. McKeon.
On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
